title: 國一Ariel - GEPT全民英檢初級口說練習

json.text: Hi everyone, this is Julia.S.Powell. I'm here with my student Ariel. I've got some GEPT Elementary speaking questions for her. Are you ready, Ariel? Yes, I am.
So....Ariel, if you could live anywhere you wanted to, where would you live and why?
I would live in America, because the air is fresher and the houses are bigger.
And what present do you want for your birthday?
I want a tsum tsum doll as my birthday present.
Do you help around your house?
Yes, I do. I sweep the floor, clean the table and do the dishes.
You want to go to a movie theater, but you are lost. Try to ask a police officer for directions.
Excuse me, police officer. I'm lost. Can you tell me how to get to Michilai movie theater?
Where do you usually hold family reunions? Why?
We usually hold family reunions at my aunt's house, because her house is bigger.
When was the last time you felt sad?
The last time I felt sad was last Saturday, because I couldn't go with my mom and my brother to Tainan that day.
What can make you happy when you are sad?
Doing exercise with my dad makes me happy when I'm sad.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read detective novels, because they are more interesting.
